Header: DCOS Reviews Construction Work in Panagoda Sports Village
Content: Major General Ajith Kariyakarawana, Deputy Chief of Staff (DCOS) together with several Officers went to the Panagoda Army cantonment and reviewed the progress of the construction work of proposed accommodation quarters, coming up with the Army Sports Village. During his stay there Major General Kariyakarawana shared views with a troops engaged with the construction work and inspired into different aspects of the ongoing project. Major General Anura Sudasinge, Director General Sports and Brigadier Prasanna Chandrasekara, Director, Real Estate and Quartering were also associated with the Deputy Chief of Staff visits to the place.
